# Data Visualization {.tabset .tabset-fade}  

## Intro  

&nbsp;  
Data Visualization -- As people who work with SAS and Excel regularly, it's quite easy to fall into the trap of believing we know how to best visualize and present data to others. But do you really?  
The aim of this section is to give you a grounding in how to best visualize data when presenting data in both static and dynamic formats.
